AI Description: xcb-util-wm is a set of utility functions for interfacing with the X Window Manager (WM) extension of the XCB library. It provides a number of functions that are useful to XCB WM clients.
Core Features: Interfacing With X Window Manager (Wm) Extension, Utility Functions For Xcb Wm Clients
General Tags: X Window System, Window Manager, Xcb Library, Utility Functions
